alert.note: Alert for Columbia; Dodge (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 19 at 2:44PM CDT until April 19 at 3:30PM CDT by NWS Milwaukee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Milwaukee/Sullivan has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Columbia County in south central Wisconsin... West central Dodge County in southeastern Wisconsin... * Until 330 PM CDT. * At 243 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Fall River to near Lodi, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. Reports of hail quickly accumulating and making roads icy. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * Locations impacted include... Columbus, Juneau, Lodi, Fall River, Arlington, Otsego, Lowell, Danville, and Leipsig. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
